text: Va ej mu'minon! Guruhe az sumo hastand, ki dar cihod dar rohi Alloh susti mekunand. Agar musiʙate ʙa sumo ʙirasad (az qaʙili sikast xurdan va kusta sudan va piruz sudani dusmanon ʙar sumo, farde, ki dar cihod sirkat nakardaast), megujad: "Ba rosti Alloh ʙa man lutf namud, ki ʙo onon hamroh va hozir naʙudam
